entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 19.

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
